""" UDF """

from pyspark.sql.functions import udf
from pyspark.sql.types import StringType


@udf(returnType=StringType())
def cz_sas_get_nl_dayoftheweekname(day):
    days = [
        "maandag",
        "dinsdag",
        "woensdag",
        "donderdag",
        "vrijdag",
        "zaterdag",
        "zondag",
    ]
    # Adjusting month index as Python lists are zero-based
    return days[day - 1]
